verses.name: Mark 9:13
verses.text: But I say unto you, That Elias is indeed come, and they have done unto him whatsoever they listed, as it is written of him.

verses.name: Mark 9:14
verses.text: And when he came to his disciples, he saw a great multitude about them, and the scribes questioning with them.

verses.name: Mark 9:15
verses.text: And straightway all the people, when they beheld him, were greatly amazed, and running to him saluted him.

verses.name: Mark 9:16
verses.text: And he asked the scribes, What question ye with them?

verses.name: Mark 9:17
verses.text: And one of the multitude answered and said, Master, I have brought unto thee my son, which hath a dumb spirit;
